metadata.title: Online Supplementary files to: Ileostomy for steroid-resistant acute graft-versus-host disease of the gastrointestinal tract

abstract.text: All patient files were reviewed manually and all relevant information for calculation of Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group performance score (ECOG) and Charlson Comorbidity Index (CCI) were extracted. Indexes were calculated and analyzed using a comparison of median and mean values and value distribution with a two sample t-test adopting a 95% confidence interval for the difference of means. We performed a supplementary Cox-regression analysis regarding the impact of ruxolitinib on overall survival by stratifying all patients with respect to treatment (ileostomy versus conventional therapy) and chose ruxolitinib as risk factor.
